actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal the earnings limitations of the Social Security Act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Removes the limitation upon the amount of outside income that an individual may earn while receiving benefits under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance).

titles.title: A bill to repeal the earnings limitations of the Social Security Act.
